name: CKRecordZone.Capabilities
desc: The capabilities that a record zone supports.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a set of capabilities for a record zone.

items.name: static var atomic: CKRecordZone.Capabilities
items.desc: A capability that allows atomic changes of multiple records.

items.name: static var fetchChanges: CKRecordZone.Capabilities
items.desc: A capability for fetching only the changed records from a zone.

items.name: static var sharing: CKRecordZone.Capabilities
items.desc: A capability for sharing a specific hierarchy of records.

items.name: static var zoneWideSharing: CKRecordZone.Capabilities
items.desc: A capability for sharing the entire contents of a record zone.
